name: Mind Shifter
description:
You can control the body of your killer and nothing stays dead for long.

This thing that I don't really dare to call a game is meant to be a prototype for a story based adventure role-playing game. It is my first game jam experience, big thanks to the GameDevTv for the opportunity. All 3D models and textures are CC0 assets I found on the internet. I am not much of an artist. Attributes can be found on the GitHub page. 

You are most welcome to leave a comment or write me directly on discord:  aliyagmur#2677 

If you are looking for a coder to work with in the future game jams or other projects, we can talk about it. Although I have only recently started to learn Unity, I am spending lots of time, geting better. I can probably code anything reasonable even if I don't know how, but it might take a bit longer to do so.

Note: The code is a mess. I worked alone and didn't have the weekdays, so I rushed during the time I had. Even I don't know how the code works anymore. Sorry in advance.
